thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: Forest City posts 2Q profit

title: Forest City posts 2Q profit
text:
Forest City posts 2Q profit Forest City Enterprises posts 2nd-quarter profit of $297.2 million 32 minutes ago Content preferences Done 
CLEVELAND (AP) _ Forest City Enterprises Inc. (FCE.A) on Tuesday reported second-quarter net income of $297.2 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier. 
On a per-share basis, the Cleveland-based company said it had profit of $1.18. 
The developer of shopping malls, office buildings and apartment complexes posted revenue of $259.8 million in the period. 
Forest City shares have risen almost 9 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $23.16, an increase of 19 percent in the last 12 months.
